div.div: We just added the Community FAQ School Closure document to our website. As stated, this is a living document that will be updated as information becomes available to us. We thank you for your patience and all of your help as we move through these extraordinary time.
The Superintendent sent out an updated communication this morning, April 17, 2020. Please read it carefully and stay healthy and safe.

If you have not been receiving updates because your email has changed due to your place of employment or other circumstances, please email your build secretary and principal. They will be able to assist you in making that change.
